name: Geko: In Search Of The Big Fly
name_original: Geko: In Search Of The Big Fly
description:
Geko: In Search of the Big Fly is a 2D platform game where you take on the role of Geko, an adventurous lizard who always finds himself in grand journeys. This time, Geko spots a succulent fly that catches his attention and decides to pursue it, facing all the obstacles that come his way. Your mission is to help Geko dodge enemies and obstacles, such as cockroaches, rats, scorpions, wasps, spiders, and steam jets, encountered along the path. To achieve this, you'll need to climb walls and skillfully jump over enemies and obstacles until you reach the grand fly.

Features:

  • Simple Mechanics: Run, jump over enemies, and climb platforms until you find the big fly!



  • Many Levels: There are 40 unique, handcrafted levels for a fun and challenging experience.



  • Colorful Pixel Art Graphics: If you enjoy Retro-style graphics, you're in the right place! You'll be enchanted by the challenges presented through the game's level design.



  • Immersive Soundtrack: An exciting soundtrack that will awaken a sense of adventure in you!

  • Unlock Achievements: Achievement hunters will love unlocking the most challenging achievements in this game. There are a total of 17 achievements to earn.
